xml.data:
Home » 40P24 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 22 Saraṇaduka, Piṭṭhiduka » 22.1 Sauttarapada » 22.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Saraṇaduka, Piṭṭhiduka
Sauttarapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
89.
188Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
189Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  noavigate ekaṃ.
190Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
191Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
192(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup22.2 Anuttarapada >>
